image.alt:
Various shapes - each shape has a small head and legs, with a caption underneath.

A Scribble shape
“A Bundle of Nerves”

A spiky star-like shape 
“A spike of panic”

A cloud shape
“A cloud of doubt”

A fruit pit or almond shape
“A pit of despair”

A mountain shape (triangle with snow on top)
“A mountain of regret”

A spiral shape
“A spiral of rumination”

A blobby shape
“ a dollop of angst”

A heart shape
“A moment of mindfulness”

A star shape
“A ray of hope”
